tradeposcn.name: &STORE_IDENTIFIER_CPS;
tradeposcn.description: This is the default Offer Price list for this store. This price list contains offer prices for all catalog entries in the master catalog. The offer price is the actual price customers must pay, before taxes, discounts, and shipping.

tradeposcn.name: &STORE_IDENTIFIER_CPS;List
tradeposcn.description: This is the default List Price list for this store. This price list contains list prices for all catalog entries in the master catalog. The list price is intended for catalog display purposes only.
